website_summaries.verdict: A few quirks aside, this spotlight is a great bet for reliability and prolonged battery life.
pros: Gets top remarks for its constant light output and fast charging time
cons: Customers must wait for the light to turn on before changing the dimmer settings

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not outstanding
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be all right, but I'm not overwhelmed. I bought it based on comments in others' reviews. It doesn't quite feel like 900 lumens. More like about 600-700. Good enough for most uses, though. Nice that they include two chargers; one for a standard wall outlet and one that works in a vehicle's 12V port. The battery comes partially charged, so you can check whether the flashlight works immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lori JE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome light
customer_reviews.text: I was so sick of searching through all the Olights and other $100 LED flashlights out there. The reviews were so mixed it left my head spinning on what to buy especially with all the different specs. I settled on this for $45 and couldn't be happier. The life of the battery really is around 5 hours on low and about 1 hour on high. Unreal. And it charges within 2 hours. Very bright flashlight. It was lighting up an area of trees 100ft x 100ft clear as day from about 200ft away. Couldn't be happier. It comes with a shoulder strap and car charger.
customer_reviews.author: Critical

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Spotlight!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these. I use them mainly to track deer shot at night and they really light up the night. The battery lasts a long time and it holds it's charge for a long time as well. I had one in my truck for 10 months and it worked perfectly when I used it. It isn't as big as it looks in the picture so it is handy to use as a big flashlight for looking for stuff in your car and things like that. One of those things I would hate to live without.
customer_reviews.author: Mthompson

customer_reviews.title: Great spotlight! Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Great spotlight ! Very bright. Battery lasts a long time. Takes a beating. This is not the first one of these I have owned. Had one of these for years,was still working great. Only reason I had to replace it is, I left it in a storage compartment in my fishing boat while on vacation. Got flooded in a heavy all night rainstorm and the spotlight got submerged. Not submersible. ( I knew that) I forgot it was in there. My fault! Still 5 stars ! Liked it enough to buy again. Glad I was able to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Hollowman

customer_reviews.title: Great bright light!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this light to have a cordless light to use for spotlighting for deer. It is much brighter than my halogen corded light and when the battery gets low it can even be plugged in your 12 volt outlet in the car. I was skeptical on using this as a spotlight at first since it's an LED, but WOW this thing is bright and outshines any of the spotlights my family members have. Also, the light from the LED is more of a white light which I find much easier to be able to spot wildlife in the woods. If you want a fairly cheap super bright spotlight, this one is it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy W.

customer_reviews.title: Worked amazing while it was still charging. I think the charging cord is the weak link.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a great light at first, then the charging issues started. I don't know if it is the cord or the product itself. I really liked this light, and the included "kick stand" piece. After looking at other reviews I'm guessing I'm not the only one with this problem. I would have given this a 5 star if the thing would just charge up. It worked pretty darn good for the first year, but $50 for one year is too high of a price for me.
customer_reviews.author: fumasterchu

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my father. He has a large 10" halogen light that had internal failure. This B&D is far brighter, and shines much farther. Looks like daylight at 100 yards. Given that it is LED it will also last longer on a charge. This light feels sturdy, and well built. Going to buy one for myself after seeing how well this light works.
customer_reviews.author: Scouthill75

customer_reviews.title: Great light and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light because my dogs always bark at night and I can never see what they are barking at but with this light I don't have that problem. Also great light for seeing out in the horse pasture to check on them at night. Definitely worth the price!!!!!!!!! Going to buy another for our good friend so they can check on the horses at night as well. I have 20 acres of land with the front 5 cleared and it lights it up with no problem. Watch where you shine it as it is very bright on high.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Should Have Bought This Light Sooner
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the light for one month so I can't comment on the longer term viability of the product. However I have been very pleased with it so far. I take the dogs out with it into our large yard and can see them quite well even out in the far corners. I can even light up the neighbor's house 700 feet across the road. I need to remember to keep the light out of the dogs' eyes. I'm also impressed with the longevity of the battery's charge. After initially charging it, I haven't had to recharge it yet. This light is far superior to the one that it replaced.

It reminds me of those search lights the circuses use to draw a crowd to their lot. BE CAREFUL and don't blind the moth piple!

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: You don't get to see what the warranty covers until you open the package: everything except the case and switch are excluded from coverage. The provisions of the coverage also exclude the case and switch if the unit has been dropped or gotten wet or submerged. The manufacturer, (not Black & Decker) has sole discretion as to whether the item has been dropped, gotten wet, or submerged. This item was not manufactured by or for Black & Decker; only the name was used.

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER LEDLIB Rechargeable 900 Lumen LED Lithium Ion Spotlight
product_meta.description: The new Black & Decker 10 Watt LED Lithium-Ion Rechargeable Spotlight is a powerful and long lasting LED spotlight. Whether at home, in your vehicle, camping, or during a roadside emergency or power failure this spotlight will allow you to illuminate even the darkest of work areas. A tight focused beam provides up to 755 lumens of output. With proprietary CLO (continuous light output) technology it allows the Black & Decker 10 Watt LED lithium-ion rechargeable spotlight to run up to 6X longer and up to 5X brighter than halogen based spotlights without dimming. A rugged pistol grip handle offers the user a comfortable grip, while use of the locking pivoting stand and convenient trigger lock provides hands-free operation. A dimmer button allows for extended runtime. A rechargeable 7.4 Volt lithium-ion battery pack is built inside for extended runtime of up to 1.5 hours on high and 7 hours on low. Lithium-ion technology allows for up to 12 months without recharging. AC and DC charging cords are included to recharge the spotlight at home or inside a vehicle. The Black & Decker 10 Watt LED Lithium-Ion Rechargeable Spotlight has been tested by independent research labs for safety and reliability, including ETL.
